rows.label: qst005801_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, take a look at this part of
this book, 'Alst: Then and Now'...

rows.label: qst005801_msg0002
rows.name:
It says there used to be a
kingdom on the Isle of Sleeping
Remains in Liberalitas.

rows.label: qst005801_msg0003
rows.name:
It seems it was destroyed by
some kind of natural disaster.

rows.label: qst005801_msg0005
rows.name:
Rex... Do you not know the
history of the place you live?

rows.label: qst005801_msg0007
rows.name:
I mean, it's not related
to salvaging, so...

rows.label: qst005801_msg0008
rows.name: You didn't know either, right, Gramps?

rows.label: qst005801_msg0009
rows.name: Hm? There is nothing I do not know.

rows.label: qst005801_msg0010
rows.name:
However, I have never heard
of such a kingdom...

rows.label: qst005801_msg0011
rows.name:
That means it might have been
from before Gramps was born, mo.

rows.label: qst005801_msg0013
rows.name: And was this kingdom a magnificent one?

rows.label: qst005801_msg0014
rows.name:
Hmm... This book doesn't
go into that much detail.

rows.label: qst005801_msg0015
rows.name:
Then we shall head to the Isle
of Sleeping Remains. Going
there might jog my memory.
